author: donaldp
msg: Fixed up build files so they don't overide users AVALON_TOOLS env var. This way you don't have any issueswhen compiling multiple projects from same shell some of which have a local tools dir.
This involved reordering search path (so ../jakarta-avalon/tools wins if present) and also not modifying the var at all - instead creating a LOCAL_AVALON_TOOLS var.

author: jefft
msg: Fix a broken, not-very-often-run Ant target

author: donaldp
msg: Remove redundencies between build.xml and docs.xml and make build.xml delegate to docs.xml

author: donaldp
msg: Use dist.name rather than manually constructing distribution name.

author: donaldp
msg: Include DTDs in the phoenix-client jar
